channel.title: Interviewing on Jesse Builds Software
channel.description: Recent content in Interviewing on Jesse Builds Software

item.title: The Average Test
item.description: I was conducting technical interviews recently for a senior developer position. I like to talk about a bunch of things, but there is one question I particularly enjoy asking each candidate. Write an implementation for this: int Average(int a, int b) { } It’s a great question because it’s a simple problem, and anyone that comes through the door should know the formula without having to ask. It’s interesting how people react to it sometimes, but I chalk it up to interview jitters.
